stories.title: UN General Assembly Passes Global AI Governance Resolution
stories.short_summary: The United Nations General Assembly has adopted a landmark resolution establishing a framework for international AI governance. The resolution calls for transparency requirements and safety standards for frontier AI systems.
talking_points: Resolution passed with 178 votes in favor, 2 against
Establishes voluntary safety benchmarks for frontier AI
Creates UN AI Advisory Office with a 50-person staff

perspectives.text: The voluntary framework balances innovation with safety.
This complements our existing AI Act with global coordination.

articles.title: UN Adopts Landmark AI Governance Resolution
Global AI Rules Take Shape at United Nations
